quote: Karma means ‘action’. Like many, you misunderstand its nature. Past misdeeds can be corrected before your karma ripens: it is not some pre-determined fate. It is what you do now that counts.
quote_letters: KARMA MEANS ACTION LIKE MANY YOU MISUNDERSTAND ITS NATURE PAST MISDEEDS CAN BE CORRECTED BEFORE YOUR KARMA RIPENS IT IS NOT SOME PRE-DETERMINED FATE IT IS WHAT YOU DO NOW THAT COUNTS
